channel.title: RuneCentre Remake 2006 Dev application
channel.description:
Current Development Team:
- Kastro - Content Dev. - Vayken - Content Dev.
We are looking for TWO more Content developers! You must: • be very knowledgeable in java programming • have some work to show • be a respectable member in any of the RSPS communities • be professional (even though our Skype chats aren't) • have spare time to work on the server
Why apply for RuneCentre?
It is soon to be the most spoken about server to date. We have two high reputable programmers who all strive for perfection. You will be loved by thousands of people. What more do you want?
Q & A
Q: Why join RuneCentre over any other 2006 remake project? A: Our developers strive for success and work behind the clock. We also gauentee the success of our community.
Q: How does RuneCentre guarantee the success of its community? A: We have the funding to buy our success if needed.
If you're interested in developing for RuneCentre, fill out the form below and reply back to this thread:
Please note the base is RuneSource. Based off Azure. You must know how to work with this source!
[QUOTE] Amount of experience: Links to other work (projects, etc.): Skype: Why we should consider you: Anything else we should know about: [/QUOTE]
Thanks,
RuneCentre Community

Current Development Team:

  • Vayken - Content Dev.

We are looking for TWO more Content developers! You must:
• be very knowledgeable in java programming
• have some work to show
• be a respectable member in any of the RSPS communities
• be professional (even though our Skype chats aren’t)
• have spare time to work on the server

It is soon to be the most spoken about server to date. We have two high reputable programmers who all strive for perfection. You will be loved by thousands of people. What more do you want?

A: Our developers strive for success and work behind the clock. We also gauentee the success of our community.
